Lei, chiaramente, insieme a tutto il cast di High School Musical e ad attori e cantanti provenienti da diversi prodotti Disney Channel. Negli anni sono cambiate moltissime cose, e la nostra ormai ex Sharpay Evans ha… Leggi tutto »Ashley Tisdale: «Il peggior bacio sullo schermo? Quello con Zac Efron»

articles.author: Davey Ferchow
articles.description:
Styles, genres, and subgenres are all useful labels that help us communicate about music, define our tastes, and develop a sense of community. Entire music scenes have been built around genres, but there was a time when the music you love didn’t have a proper name. In some cases, journalists or DJs coined a new […]
The post 5 Album Titles That Inspired Music Genre Names appeared first on Discogs Blog.
articles.title: 5 Album Titles That Inspired Music Genre Names
